history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02882
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DEVELOPING, SUPPORTING AND PROVIDING VARIOUS INCENTIVES TO INNOVATIVE START-UP ENTREPRENEURS AND ITS INVESTORS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLAFUERTE, LUIS RAYMUND JR. F.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-15
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-10-03
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-11-20
      3. Deliberated by the TWG on 2019-01-10
      4. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-01-15
          -Deliberation and approval of the draft substitute bill to House Bills Nos. 2882, 3057, 6609, and 7803 i.e. proposed Innovative Start-up Act.
      5. Committee Report filed on 2019-01-22
          -Committee Report No. 1073, House Bill No. 8862 in substitution of House Bills Numbered 2882, 3057, 6609 and 7803.
MOTHER BILL: HB08862
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRADE AND INDUSTRY ON 2016-08-22
